page.title: 12IBSTOCK COMMUNITY COLLEGE -2
page.content: The college has specialised in helping the physically disabled people of the area. There is a daytime workshop, weekly social and swimming clubs. They are beginning a major new project to help the unemployed. Staff hope to extend people's horizons and improve their quality of life by encouraging various pursuits (e.g. youth hostelling). They run a welfare rights bureau fortnightly at which people may discuss in private any social problems they may have. College staff see themselves as an agency for serving the community's needs as and when they arise. Dealing with people was considered the best and worst aspect of the job of Community Tutor.
